2. Council

Council
=======

Agenda & Minutes
----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://www.cliftonnj.org/agendacenter)

1. **Clifton City Hall**  
   900 Clifton Avenue
